title: Workshop on Blended Learning-Based Cell Biology Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational biology knowledge and teaching experience
context.additional_context: An activity-based blended learning program to strengthen cell biology teaching competencies for pre-/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of cell structure and function through scientific inquiry processes.
Learners can design and apply activity-based teaching methods in blended learning environments.
Learners develop instructional strategies to effectively convey the scientific thinking process (hypothesis formation → experimental analysis → conclusion drawing) to students.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
